column3: ACK 095bc9a10691505c3d0fdacb6caeb62bfdcf1732\n\nThanks a lot for fixing this mistake of mine @brakmic – the intention was `reserve` but apparently I wrote `resize`. Sorry! :)

> 
> Thanks a lot for fixing this mistake of mine @brakmic – the intention was `reserve` but apparently I wrote `rewrite`. Sorry! :)

Cheers!
